channel.title: Milestone 11 Requirements (Fall 2022) :: K-State CIS 400 Textbook
channel.description: Web Only This textbook was authored for the CIS 400 - Object-Oriented Design, Implementation, and Testing course at Kansas State University. This section describes assignments specific to the Fall 2022 offering of that course. Assignment requirements: Deploy your website to Azure Web Services Purpose: To practice deploying original web applications to Azure Web Services Assignment Details For this milestone you will be deploying your website project to Azure web services.
